findings.liver: The hepatic parenchyma appears within normal limits. The contour of the liver is smooth. There is no focal liver mass. The main portal vein is patent with hepatopetal flow. There is no ascites.
findings.bile_ducts: There is no intrahepatic biliary dilation. The CBD measures 5 mm. No definite evidence of choledocholithiasis.
findings.gallbladder: The gallbladder is distended, with multiple layering gallstones noted. Several gallstones reside in the gallbladder neck. No definite gallbladder wall thickening or pericholecystic fluid.
findings.pancreas: Imaged portion of the pancreas appears within normal limits, without masses or pancreatic ductal dilation.
findings.kidneys: The right kidney measures 8.8 cm. The left kidney measures 10.0 cm. Normal cortical echogenicity and corticomedullary differentiation is seen bilaterally. There is no evidence of masses, stones, or hydronephrosis in the kidneys.
findings.retroperitoneum: Visualized portions of aorta and IVC are within normal limits.
